titleStmt.title: The happy lover: or, Celia won by Aminta's loyalty. A new song in great request at court. To an excellent new tune: Or, Why are my eyes, &c. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Blare, at the Looking-Glass, on London Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Why are my eyes still flow--ing? Why do's my heart thus trembling move?".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
